name: simple-comparator
description: A production-ready deep equality comparison library for JavaScript and TypeScript, supporting complex objects, arrays, and primitive types with circular reference detection. Works seamlessly across Node.js, Deno, and browser environments.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist_commonjs/* dist_es6/* && tsc --project tsconfig-commonjs.json && tsc --project tsconfig-es6.json && pnpm minify:all && pnpm rename-cjs && pnpm fix-maps
scripts.minify:commonjs: for file in $(find dist_commonjs -name '*.js'); do terser "$file" -c -m --source-map "content='${file}.map',url='$(basename ${file%.*}).cjs.map'" -o "$file"; done
scripts.minify:es6: for file in $(find dist_es6 -name '*.js'); do terser "$file" -c -m --source-map "content='${file}.map',url='$(basename ${file}).map'" -o "$file"; done
scripts.test: pnpm lint:all && jest && jest -c jest-node.config.json && pnpm test:deno
scripts.test:deno:
command -v deno >/dev/null 2>&1 && (deno test --config tsconfig-deno.json || exit 1) || (echo '
ℹ️  [33mDeno is not installed. Skipping Deno tests.[0m' && exit 0)
scripts.lint:all: pnpm tsc:check && pnpm lint && pnpm lint:md && pnpm publint && pnpm format

author: dominikj111
